code: import React,{useState,useRef,useEffect}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function TerminalPortfolio(){const[output,setOutput]=useState(["Welcome to Irene's Portfolio!
